title: Why does it feel like Riot puts 10x more time, passion and effort into their Music department
body:
compared to any other part of their game?

I'm not complaining (I enjoy the fuck out of their music) but it just boggles my mind how their music is just leagues above every other aspect of league.

I didn't _get_ Jhin when I read his lore, or when I played him, only when I listened to his theme did I really feel like I understood this character.

I just don't understand how a company that loves to charge for shit that should be unlocked with IP (chromas, icons) makes and releases all this goddamn amazing music for free.
